repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A manuscript containing the Mahābhāratatātparyanirṇaya by Ānandatīrtha (Adhyāya 1-32).

msItem.title: Mahābhāratatātparyanirṇaya
msItem.author: Ānandatīrtha
msItem.incipit:
nārāyaṇāya paripūrṇaṃ guṇārṇavāya viśvodayasthitilayonniyatipradāya | jñāna
pradāya vibudhāsurasaukhyadukkhasatkāraṇāya vitatāya namo namas te || āsīd udāraguṇavāridhir aprameyo nārā
yaṇaḥ paratamaḥ paramāt sa ekaḥ | saṃśāṃtasaṃvid akhilaṃ jaṭhare nidhāya lakṣmībhujāntaragataḥ svarato pi cā
gre |
msItem.explicit:
yaḥ sarvaguṇasaṃpūrṇaḥ sarvadoṣavivarjitaḥ | prīyatāṃ prīyatevālaṃ viṣṇur me paramaḥ suhṛt |
yasya trīṇy uditāni vedavacanaiḥ rūpāṇi divyānalaṃ paṭtaddarśitam ittham eva nihataṃ devasya bhargo mahat | vāyo rāmavacona
yaṃ prathamakaṃ pṛkṣo dvitīyyaṃ vapuḥ madhvo yat tu tṛtīyyam etad amunā graṃthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave ||—|| ❈ ||
msItem.finalRubric:
iti śrī madā
naṃdatīrthabhagavatpādācāryaviraviracite śrīmanmahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye dvātriṃśo dhyāyaḥ ||—|| śrī kṛṣṇārpaṇa
m astu | anena śrībhāratīramaṇamukhyaprāṇāṃtargata śrītapati śrīrāmabhāmāṃtargata śrīrukmiṇisatyabhāmā
pati śrīkṛṣṇa śrīlakṣmīpati śrīvedavyāsādy anaṃtāvatārātmaka śrīlakṣmīnārāyanaḥ priyatāṃ | saputrasya mama jñāna
bhaktiviraktī datvā rakṣu||—|| śrī ||—|| śrī ||—|| śrī ||

supportDesc.condition: Damaged, partly unreadable, torn on the right side on some folios.

additions.desc: kolhāpuropanāma kasya dāsācāryāṇāṃ pautrasya anaṃtācāryaputrasya rāghaveṃdrasyedaṃ pustakaṃ

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1987. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 8. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. MS 3459. p. 1091.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible. ❈ denotes a puṣpikā.
